entries.description: The Silver Heaven; holy water laps at the base of the mountain under a starry sky.
The Golden Heaven; tame slopes and lush valleys.
The Pearly Heaven; orchards and snowfields gleam with heavenly light.
The Crystal Heaven; shrines glitter under a silvery sky amid luminescent fog.
The Platinum Heaven; holy soldiers muster in grand citadels.
The Glittering Heaven; home to the seven-tiered Heavenly City.
The Illuminated Heaven; an ineffable mystery.
